ProjectTitle: Mechanisms and consequences of signaling via ion channels in the bladder wall.
InitialFeedbackHistory:
19/07/2024
Data preservation after the end of the research project:
Note that MANGO is an active Data Management Platform where researchers can store and manage their data during the active phase of their research projects. ManGO is thus not meant as a data preservation tool, but rather for storage of active data during your research project. 
Also note that the KU Leuven RDM policy requires you to store all relevant data (usually data underlying a publication or data that can't be recreated) for at least 10 years after the end of the project.
label: good with suggestions
